storyTitle: As HR Manager, I want to synchronize employee personal data daily to achieve up-to-date records

testCases.title: Validate successful daily synchronization of employee data
preconditions: HR system API is accessible and operational
API authentication credentials are configured correctly
Scheduled synchronization job is configured for daily execution
Test employee data exists in HR system with all mandatory fields populated
Network connectivity between systems is stable
Database has sufficient storage for employee records

steps.action: Trigger the scheduled synchronization job manually or wait for scheduled execution time
steps.expectedResult: Synchronization job starts successfully and initiates connection to HR system API /employees endpoint

steps.action: Monitor the synchronization process as employee data is retrieved from HR system
steps.expectedResult: Employee data is successfully retrieved from HR API with HTTP 200 status code and data extraction completes without errors

steps.action: Observe the data validation process for mandatory fields
steps.expectedResult: All mandatory fields are validated successfully and no validation errors are generated

steps.action: Verify that employee records are updated or created in the new platform database
steps.expectedResult: All employee records are successfully inserted or updated in the database with correct data mapping

steps.action: Navigate to the employee records section in the new platform and verify updated records
steps.expectedResult: Employee records in the new platform reflect the latest data from HR system including all personal information fields

steps.action: Access the synchronization logs via /api/hr/sync logs or admin dashboard
steps.expectedResult: Synchronization logs show successful completion status with no errors logged

steps.action: Check the completion timestamp in the synchronization logs
steps.expectedResult: Synchronization completed within 30 minutes SLA from start time

steps.action: Verify the total count of records processed matches the count in HR system
steps.expectedResult: Record count matches 100% with no data loss reported

postconditions: All employee records are synchronized and up-to-date in the new platform
Synchronization logs contain complete execution details with success status
No error notifications sent to HR team
System is ready for next scheduled synchronization
Database integrity is maintained

testCases.title: Verify handling of incomplete employee data
preconditions: HR system API is accessible and operational
API authentication credentials are configured correctly
Test employee records with missing mandatory fields are prepared in HR system
Validation rules for mandatory fields are configured in the synchronization system
Error logging mechanism is functional
At least one complete employee record exists for processing verification

steps.action: Prepare test data in HR system with employee records missing mandatory fields (e.g., employee ID, first name, last name, or email)
steps.expectedResult: Test employee records with incomplete data are available in HR system API response

steps.action: Trigger the synchronization job to process employee data including incomplete records
steps.expectedResult: Synchronization job starts and begins retrieving employee data from HR API

steps.action: Monitor the validation process as incomplete employee records are processed
steps.expectedResult: System detects missing mandatory fields and generates validation errors for incomplete records

steps.action: Access synchronization logs and search for error entries related to incomplete records
steps.expectedResult: Synchronization logs contain specific error messages identifying which records failed validation and which mandatory fields are missing

steps.action: Verify that incomplete employee records are not created or updated in the new platform database
steps.expectedResult: Incomplete records are skipped and not inserted/updated in the database, maintaining data integrity

steps.action: Check that synchronization continues processing remaining valid employee records after encountering incomplete data
steps.expectedResult: System continues processing and successfully synchronizes all complete employee records without stopping

steps.action: Verify error notification is sent to HR team with details of incomplete records
steps.expectedResult: HR team receives error report listing all incomplete records with specific missing field information

steps.action: Confirm the synchronization job completes with partial success status
steps.expectedResult: Synchronization completes with status indicating successful processing of valid records and errors for incomplete records

postconditions: Only complete employee records are synchronized to the new platform
Incomplete records remain unprocessed and are not stored in database
Error logs contain detailed information about validation failures
HR team is notified of incomplete records requiring correction
System maintains data quality and integrity
Synchronization process completed without system failure

storyTitle: As HR Analyst, I want to manually trigger employee data synchronization to achieve immediate updates

testCases.title: Verify authorized user can trigger manual sync
preconditions: HR Analyst user account exists with proper role-based access control permissions
HR system API is accessible and operational
Manual synchronization endpoint /api/hr/sync/manual is deployed and functional
User has valid login credentials for HR Analyst role
Synchronization page UI is accessible in the application
Test employee data exists in HR system for synchronization
Logging system is operational to capture manual sync events

steps.action: Navigate to the application login page and enter valid HR Analyst credentials
steps.expectedResult: Login is successful and user is authenticated as HR Analyst

steps.action: Access the synchronization page from the main navigation menu or dashboard
steps.expectedResult: Synchronization page loads successfully and 'Sync Now' button is visible and enabled for HR Analyst

steps.action: Click the 'Sync Now' button to trigger manual employee data synchronization
steps.expectedResult: Manual synchronization process initiates immediately and status indicator shows 'Synchronization in Progress'

steps.action: Observe the real-time synchronization status displayed on the page
steps.expectedResult: Status updates are displayed showing progress such as 'Connecting to HR API', 'Retrieving data', 'Validating records', 'Updating database'

steps.action: Wait for the synchronization process to complete
steps.expectedResult: Synchronization completes within 30 minutes and final status shows 'Synchronization Completed Successfully' with summary of records processed

steps.action: Review the synchronization results displayed on the page
steps.expectedResult: Results show total records processed, successful updates, any errors encountered, and completion timestamp

steps.action: Navigate to the synchronization logs section or access logs via admin panel
steps.expectedResult: Manual sync event is logged in the system logs

steps.action: Verify the log entry contains user information and timestamp
steps.expectedResult: Log entry shows correct HR Analyst username, timestamp of manual sync trigger, and event type as 'Manual Synchronization'

steps.action: Verify employee records in the new platform reflect the latest data from HR system
steps.expectedResult: Employee records are updated with the most recent data from HR system matching the manual sync timestamp

postconditions: Employee data is synchronized and up-to-date in the new platform
Manual sync event is logged with correct user and timestamp details
Synchronization status is displayed accurately to the HR Analyst
User remains logged in and can perform additional operations
System is ready for subsequent manual or scheduled synchronizations

testCases.title: Verify unauthorized user cannot trigger manual sync
preconditions: Non-HR user account exists without HR Analyst role permissions
Role-based access control is properly configured in the system
Manual synchronization endpoint /api/hr/sync/manual has authorization checks enabled
User has valid login credentials for non-HR role (e.g., regular employee, viewer)
Security policies are enforced at both UI and API levels

steps.action: Navigate to the application login page and enter valid credentials for a non-HR user account
steps.expectedResult: Login is successful and user is authenticated with non-HR role permissions

steps.action: Attempt to navigate to the synchronization page via direct URL or menu navigation
steps.expectedResult: Access is denied and user receives 'Access Denied' or '403 Forbidden' error message, or synchronization page is not visible in navigation menu

steps.action: Verify that the synchronization page does not load and user is redirected to unauthorized access page or dashboard
steps.expectedResult: User cannot access the synchronization page and appropriate error message is displayed indicating insufficient permissions

steps.action: Using API testing tool (e.g., Postman, cURL), attempt to directly call the manual sync API endpoint /api/hr/sync/manual with non-HR user authentication token
steps.expectedResult: API request is rejected with HTTP 401 Unauthorized or 403 Forbidden status code

steps.action: Verify the API error response contains appropriate authorization error message
steps.expectedResult: Response body contains error message such as 'Unauthorized access' or 'Insufficient permissions to perform this operation'

steps.action: Check security logs for unauthorized access attempts
steps.expectedResult: Security logs record the unauthorized access attempt with user details, timestamp, and denied action

steps.action: Verify that no synchronization process was initiated by the unauthorized attempt
steps.expectedResult: Synchronization logs show no new manual sync events triggered by the non-HR user

steps.action: Confirm employee data remains unchanged and no unintended synchronization occurred
steps.expectedResult: Employee records show no updates from unauthorized sync attempt and data integrity is maintained

postconditions: Unauthorized user access is successfully blocked at both UI and API levels
No manual synchronization is triggered by unauthorized user
Security logs contain record of unauthorized access attempt
Employee data remains unchanged and secure
System security controls are validated as functional
User session remains active but restricted to authorized functions only
